comments.body: This can actually probably be put upstream because I don't think this is an issue for modern OSX machines - unless we try and check for the OSX build before disabling it automatically.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@          endif()
-         if (JPEG_FOUND AND LIBJPEG_IS_GOOD AND NOT APPLE)
+         if (JPEG_FOUND AND LIBJPEG_IS_GOOD)
             include_directories(${JPEG_INCLUDE_DIR})
             set (dlib_needed_libraries ${dlib_needed_libraries} ${JPEG_LIBRARY})
